mapper.insert: insert into class(class_id, facility_id, class_name, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, price, class_size) values(#{class_id}, #{facility_id}, #{class_name}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{price}, #{class_size});
insert into class_detail(class_id, weekday, class_date) values(#{class_id}, #{weekday}, #{class_date});
